data.actual_result: Keyboard remains opened letting you use it in your homescreen (weird...)
data.expected_result: Discord app should close the keyboard before tabbing out
data.short_description: Keyboard stays opened if you press the Recent Tasks button on your device while Search bar is focused
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel - Go to Search. The keyboard should popup - Press the Recent Tasks button on your device
